data.remarks: Percentage of holding of one of the Promoters, i.e. Indigold Trade and Services Limited is reducing from 72.62% to 8.77% because of the allotments made to the eligible shareholders to Aditya Birla Nuvo Limited and Madura Garments Lifestyle Retail Company Limited pursuant to the Composite Scheme of Arrangement.
